headline: L3Harris to Present at Three Upcoming Investor Conferences
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., April 28, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) Chief Financial Officer and Aerojet Rocketdyne President Ken Bedingfield will present at Barclays Americas Select Franchise Conference in London at 8:30 a.m. local (3:30 a.m. ET) on Tuesday, May 6. The presentation will stream live on the L3Harris website, with a recording available after the event.
